name: PopupBooster
tag_list: real-time, behavioral, dynamic-website, targeting, b2b, b2c, advertising
overview:
Real-time behavioral targeting service for making websites dynamic:

  • B2C: improves conversion rates
  • Ad revenue: more page views
  • B2B: enables relevant content

Benefits: * longer visits * maximizing visitor engagement * increase conversion * increase acquisition rates * increase sales * boost loyality

Making your online content more relevant to your visitors !
